name: dockerizalo
description: Dockerizalo provides an easy way to deploy and orchestrate Docker-based apps using pre-configured stacks. It includes automated setup scripts and templates for self-hosting common tools and services.
features: Pre-Configured Stacks: Deploy popular apps with ready-made templates. Instant deployment.
Automated Setup: Scripts handle complex configuration automatically. No manual setup needed.
Service Templates: Library of common self-hosted tools. Quick stack deployment.
Orchestration Made Easy: Simplified Docker Compose management. Streamlined operations.
Homelab Ready: Perfect for personal server environments. Build your stack quickly.
Self-Hosted: Deploy everything on your infrastructure. Complete control and privacy.
